body: Hey guys today I though of a cool idea, so here it is. I think that Avicus should bring in a Legend Rank for people who have a certain amount of    days online. I don't know how many days would be suitable for this rank, that's why I want you to suggest how much. Also feedback would be much appreciated <3

title: [Suggestion] Legend Rank

replies.body: Hmm, well what would be in the rank, and also it would have to be more than one year, probably two. Or just one year of online.
replies.body_tagged: Hmm, well what would be in the rank, and also it would have to be more than one year, probably two. Or just one year of online.

replies.body: Good idea (+1) but this would be extremely rare for people. I have been playing on this server for about a year and a half, yet only have 10 days play time.
replies.body_tagged: Good idea (+1) but this would be extremely rare for people. I have been playing on this server for about a year and a half, yet only have 10 days play time.

replies.body: No, we aren't adding ranks for playing time.
replies.body_tagged: No, we aren't adding ranks for playing time.

replies.body: -1, I think we have enough donor ranks already.
replies.body_tagged: -1, I think we have enough donor ranks already.

replies.body: -1 What would be the advantages of it? And, as Awarrior said: "Mineplex".
